item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: In addition to the the promo card, I got a Comet Storm in my sealed pool, and one more in my prize packs. :D #mtg #wwk

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Only went 3-1 at the Worldwake prerelease. Mana screw FTL. =/ #mtg #wwk

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: #mtg #WWK Celestial Colonnade (R) Land ETB tapped T: U or W. 3UW: Becomes 4/4 u/w elem w/flying and vigilance until EOT https://www.mtgsalvation.com/forums/magic-fundamentals/the-rumor-mill/226949-wwk-celestial-colonnade-buy-a-box-promo#c1
